moduleDescription: NetHunter mein aane wale har tarah ke errors ka complete solution - VNC, KEX, Terminal, Installation aur Performance issues

content.intro: NetHunter installation ke dauran aane wale common errors aur unke step-by-step solutions.

sections.heading: Installation Script Errors
sections.text:
Common Installation Issues:

• Script download failed
• Permission denied errors
• Network connectivity issues
• Storage space insufficient
• Termux version compatibility
• Architecture mismatch
• Corrupted download files

commands.explanation: Termux version check karta hai compatibility ke liye
Termux ko latest version mein update karta hai
Available storage space check karta hai
Package cache clear kar ke space free karta hai

sections.heading: Download & Network Issues
sections.text:
Network Related Problems:

• Slow internet connection
• DNS resolution failures
• Proxy/firewall blocking
• Server unavailable
• Incomplete downloads
• Certificate errors

commands.explanation: Internet connectivity test karta hai
DNS resolution test karta hai
Certificate check bypass kar ke download karta hai
Incomplete download resume karta hai

sections.heading: Permission & Access Errors
sections.text:
Permission Related Issues:

• Script not executable
• Storage permission denied
• Root access required
• SELinux blocking
• App permission issues

commands.explanation: Installation script ko executable permission deta hai
Storage access permission setup karta hai
File permissions check karta hai
Binary files ke permissions fix karta hai

sections.heading: Architecture & Compatibility
sections.text:
Device Compatibility Issues:

• ARM64 vs ARM32
• Android version compatibility
• Kernel version issues
• Hardware limitations
• Manufacturer restrictions

commands.explanation: Device architecture check karta hai
Android version check karta hai
Kernel version information dikhata hai
Device model aur manufacturer information

content.intro: VNC server setup, connection problems aur performance issues ka complete troubleshooting guide.

sections.heading: VNC Installation Problems
sections.text:
VNC Installation Issues:

• Package not found
• Dependencies missing
• Installation failed
• Version conflicts
• Repository issues

commands.explanation: Package repository lists update karta hai
TightVNC server install karta hai
TigerVNC server alternative install karta hai
Broken package dependencies fix karta hai

sections.heading: VNC Server Startup Issues
sections.text:
Server Startup Problems:

• Server won't start
• Port already in use
• Display number conflicts
• Permission errors
• Configuration issues

commands.explanation: Running VNC server ko terminate karta hai
Running VNC processes check karta hai
VNC server detailed parameters ke saath start karta hai
VNC server log files check karta hai

sections.heading: VNC Connection Problems
sections.text:
Connection Issues:

• Can't connect to server
• Authentication failed
• Black screen
• Connection timeout
• Network issues

commands.explanation: Active VNC sessions list karta hai
VNC port listening status check karta hai
VNC access password reset karta hai
VNC port firewall rules check karta hai

sections.heading: VNC Display Issues
sections.text:
Display Problems:

• Black/blank screen
• Wrong resolution
• Color depth issues
• Font problems
• Desktop environment not loading

commands.explanation: XFCE desktop environment install karta hai
VNC startup script configure karta hai
Essential fonts install karta hai
VNC display resolution fix karta hai

sections.heading: VNC Performance Optimization
sections.text:
Performance Issues:

• Slow response
• High CPU usage
• Memory consumption
• Network bandwidth
• Lag in display updates

commands.explanation: Low color depth se performance improve karta hai
Desktop compositing disable kar ke performance improve karta hai
VNC configuration optimize karta hai
VNC server resource usage monitor karta hai

content.intro: KEX desktop environment issues, GUI problems aur performance optimization techniques.

sections.heading: KEX Installation Issues
sections.text:
KEX Setup Problems:

• KEX not found
• Installation incomplete
• Dependencies missing
• Desktop environment conflicts
• Configuration errors

commands.explanation: Kali Win-KEX package install karta hai
KEX ke liye required desktop environment install karta hai
KEX binary installation verify karta hai
Installed KEX version check karta hai

sections.heading: KEX Startup Problems
sections.text:
KEX Launch Issues:

• KEX won't start
• Command not found
• Display errors
• Authentication issues
• Service conflicts

commands.explanation: KEX desktop environment start karta hai
KEX password setup ke saath start karta hai
KEX service status check karta hai
KEX services stop karta hai

sections.heading: KEX Display Issues
sections.text:
Display Problems:

• Black screen
• Resolution issues
• Color problems
• Font rendering
• Window manager issues

commands.explanation: KEX Windows-style mode mein start karta hai
KEX Enhanced Session Mode start karta hai
KEX Seamless mode start karta hai
KEX configuration reset kar ke fresh start karta hai

sections.heading: KEX Performance Issues
sections.text:
Performance Problems:

• Slow GUI response
• High memory usage
• CPU consumption
• Network lag
• Application crashes

commands.explanation: KEX related processes aur resource usage check karta hai
KEX shared mode mein start kar ke performance improve karta hai
Stuck KEX processes terminate karta hai
KEX log files clean karta hai

sections.heading: KEX Connection Issues
sections.text:
Connection Problems:

• Can't connect via RDP
• VNC connection failed
• Authentication errors
• Network connectivity
• Port conflicts

commands.explanation: KEX listening ports check karta hai
KEX RDP mode mein start karta hai
Local VNC connection test karta hai
KEX debug mode mein start kar ke detailed logs dekh sakte hain

content.intro: Terminal access problems, shell configuration issues aur command execution errors ka solution.

sections.heading: Terminal Access Problems
sections.text:
Terminal Issues:

• Terminal won't open
• Shell not responding
• Command not found errors
• Path issues
• Environment variables missing

commands.explanation: Current shell check karta hai
System mein available shells list karta hai
Default shell change karta hai
Terminal display reset karta hai

sections.heading: Command Path Issues
sections.text:
PATH Problems:

• Commands not found
• Binary not in PATH
• Environment not loaded
• Profile not sourced
• Custom paths missing

commands.explanation: Current PATH environment variable dikhata hai
PATH mein new directory add karta hai
Bash profile reload karta hai
Command ka exact location find karta hai

sections.heading: Permission & Sudo Issues
sections.text:
Permission Problems:

• Permission denied
• Sudo not working
• User not in sudoers
• Root access issues
• File ownership problems

commands.explanation: Current user ke groups dikhata hai
Sudo permissions check karta hai
Home directory ownership fix karta hai
User ko sudo group mein add karta hai

sections.heading: Environment Configuration
sections.text:
Environment Issues:

• Variables not set
• Aliases not working
• Functions missing
• Prompt issues
• History problems

commands.explanation: Environment variables list karta hai
Environment variable set karta hai
Defined aliases list karta hai
Shell environment reload karta hai

sections.heading: Terminal Performance Issues
sections.text:
Performance Problems:

• Slow command execution
• High memory usage
• Terminal lag
• History issues
• Tab completion slow

commands.explanation: Command history clear karta hai
Bash hash table disable kar ke performance improve karta hai
Terminal dimensions check karta hai
Terminal settings reset karta hai

content.intro: NetHunter tools installation problems, configuration issues aur dependency conflicts ka solution.

sections.heading: Package Installation Errors
sections.text:
Installation Problems:

• Package not found
• Dependencies unmet
• Repository issues
• GPG key errors
• Network timeouts

commands.explanation: Package repository lists update karta hai
Broken package dependencies repair karta hai
Package cache clean karta hai
Package ko force reinstall karta hai

sections.heading: Repository & GPG Issues
sections.text:
Repository Problems:

• GPG signature verification failed
• Repository not accessible
• Mirror issues
• SSL certificate errors
• Outdated repository lists

commands.explanation: Kali Linux GPG key add karta hai
GPG keys update karta hai
Repository sources list check karta hai

commands.command: echo 'deb http://http.kali.org/kali kali-rolling main non-free contrib' > /etc/apt/sources.list
commands.explanation: Kali repository sources fix karta hai

sections.heading: Tool-Specific Issues
sections.text:
Common Tool Problems:

• Nmap not working
• Metasploit errors
• Aircrack-ng issues
• Sqlmap problems
• Burp Suite crashes

commands.command: apt install nmap metasploit-framework aircrack-ng sqlmap -y
commands.explanation: Essential penetration testing tools install karta hai
Metasploit framework update karta hai
Metasploit database initialize karta hai
Installed tools ke versions check karta hai

sections.heading: Python & Pip Issues
sections.text:
Python Problems:

• Python version conflicts
• Pip not working
• Module import errors
• Virtual environment issues
• Package conflicts

commands.explanation: Python aur pip versions check karta hai
Pip ko latest version mein upgrade karta hai
Common Python libraries install karta hai
Python path environment variable fix karta hai

sections.heading: Database & Service Issues
sections.text:
Service Problems:

• PostgreSQL not starting
• Apache service issues
• SSH daemon problems
• Database connection errors
• Service permission issues

commands.explanation: PostgreSQL database service start karta hai
Important services ka status check karta hai
Service ko boot time pe auto-start enable karta hai
Service script permissions fix karta hai

content.intro: NetHunter performance optimization, memory management aur system resource issues ka solution.

sections.heading: Memory Management Issues
sections.text:
Memory Problems:

• Out of memory errors
• High RAM usage
• Swap space issues
• Memory leaks
• Application crashes

commands.explanation: System memory usage dikhata hai
Memory usage ke hisab se processes sort karta hai
System cache clear karta hai
Memory consuming processes terminate karta hai

sections.heading: Storage Space Issues
sections.text:
Storage Problems:

• Disk space full
• Temporary files accumulation
• Log files growing
• Package cache bloat
• Large file identification

commands.explanation: Disk space usage dikhata hai
Large files aur directories find karta hai
Temporary files aur cache clean karta hai
Package cache aur unused packages remove karta hai

sections.heading: CPU Performance Issues
sections.text:
CPU Problems:

• High CPU usage
• System slowdown
• Process hanging
• Thermal throttling
• Background processes

commands.explanation: CPU usage ke hisab se processes monitor karta hai
Process hierarchy tree dikhata hai
CPU intensive process terminate karta hai
System load average dikhata hai

sections.heading: Network Performance Issues
sections.text:
Network Problems:

• Slow internet speed
• Connection timeouts
• DNS resolution slow
• High latency
• Bandwidth limitations

commands.explanation: Network download speed test karta hai
DNS query response time check karta hai
Network interface statistics dikhata hai
Network latency aur packet loss test karta hai

sections.heading: System Optimization
sections.text:
Optimization Techniques:

• Service management
• Startup optimization
• Resource allocation
• Background processes
• System tuning

commands.explanation: Unnecessary services disable karta hai
System swappiness optimize karta hai
7 din se purane system logs clean karta hai
System resource usage summary dikhata hai
